ygData.subject: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone confirm with me whether the fiery avenger is a 1h slashing or a 2h slashing weapon..hehe so that I can made amendments. For those who havent take up
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone confirm with me whether the fiery avenger is a 1h slashing or a 2h slashing weapon..hehe so that I can made amendments.

For those who havent take up brewing,its a very fast to max up..I only used 6pp+ at 75int to max out at 135 and used profit to buy myself full banded..so I suggest to get it ASAP.
Another trick is to use brewing to sponser any other tradeskill u want..eg smithing..brew up 200pp and oneshot in smithing..sure master one! ;)

Till then

Entreri aka Terrien
